statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

statistics.name: minutes
statistics.description: The total number of minutes played.

statistics.name: assistTurnoverRatio
statistics.description: The average number of assists a player or team records per turnover

statistics.name: rebounds
statistics.description: The total number of rebounds (offensive and defensive).

statistics.name: defensiveRebounds
statistics.description: The number of times when the defense obtains the possession of the ball after a missed shot by the offense.

statistics.name: offensiveRebounds
statistics.description: The number of times when the offense obtains the possession of the ball after a missed shot.

article.description: Keiton Page scored 18 points, Marshall Moses added 16 and Darrell Williams finished with 11 as Oklahoma State defeated Nicholls State 76-56 on Sunday.
article.headline: Balanced attack leads Oklahoma State to win
article.linkText: Balanced attack leads Oklahoma State to win
article.story: STILLWATER, Okla. -- Keiton Page scored 18 points, Marshall Moses added 16 and Darrell Williams finished with 11 as Oklahoma State defeated Nicholls State 76-56 on Sunday. Williams pulled down a game-high 14 rebounds and also had three blocks. The Cowboys (3-0) shot 63 percent from the floor and outrebounded the Colonels, 36-23. Anatoly Bose scored a game-high 37 points for Nicholls State (1-2), but the visitors managed just 31 percent (16-of-51) from the field in falling to 1-2. Bose was 14-of-15 from the foul line. Oklahoma State led 33-22 at halftime and opened the second half with a 7-0 run to take control. Moses' basket with 12 minutes remaining pushed the lead to 50-31 as Nicholls State continued to struggle from the floor, hitting just 3-of-14 shot attempts over the first eight minutes of the second half.
